reservation-description: Simplify the reservation process for any event. Our online booking system provides a convenient and efficient way to schedule your appointments and reservations. Don't want to sign up? You can easily reserve and create an event with a few clicks without signing up! Suitable for creating quick events for groups of friends without too much hassle. Suitable for businesses that want the traditional appointments model.
create-event-description: Create an Event now with a few clicks without any hassle or signing up. You can view a list of people who reserved and end reservations early or edit event information.
create-queue-description: Create a queue line in one step and people can queue up with the link. You can also reset the queue or mark people as served.
create-appointment-description: Suitable for any type of user whether you are an organization who wants to let customers know its appointment slots or someone who wants to create a calendar that shows their free time for other people.
name: Name
error-message: Error 404: Action failed, object cannot be found.
email-sent: An email has been sent with both links.
start-time-required: Start Time & End Time are required
end-time-after-start-time: End Time must be after Start Time
future-start-time: Please pick a future Start Time
slot-error: Error: Action failed, slot cannot be added.

validation.name-length: Name must be between 2 and 15 characters
validation.email-format: Correct Email Address format is required
validation.description-length: Description must be between 10 and 100 characters
validation.phone-number-format: Phone Number must be between 10 and 16 characters including the country code
validation.slot-already-reserved: This slot has already been reserved.
validation.title-length: Event Title must be between 2 and 15 characters
validation.maximum-capacity-gt-current: Current Capacity cannot be greater than Maximum Capacity
validation.image-extension: Image must be a jpeg, jpg or png
validation.start-date-future: Please pick a date at least 1 hour from now
validation.start-date-before-end-date: Start Date must be before End Date
validation.phone-number-already-exists: This phone number already exists in the queue.
